item.title: Install and Configure Samba
item.description: SMB File Share Update System sudo apt update Install Samba sudo apt install samba Edit Share Config sudo vim /etc/samba/smb.conf Add share point at the bottom of the config file [share-name] comment = Your Comment Here path = /path/to/share/dir read only = no browsable = yes Start Samba sudo systemctl start smbd.service Enable Autostart sudo systemctl enable smbd.service Update Firewall Rules sudo ufw allow samba Setting User Password sudo smbpasswd -a username Warning
